Object.Name: Device Status
Object.Description1: Sends the current status of the Lw2m? Idk, you know what I mean thingy right. Why are you even reading this.

Item.Name: Status
Item.Description: The current status of the device, might be like "Unregistered", "Working", "Dead", "Happy", not sure yet

Item.Name: RegisterCode
Item.Description: The code the device should showcase ðŸ‘ Max 8 characters are we will crash, this is a threat >:(

Item.Name: Time
Item.Description: Give us the time, we're a poor old grandma asking for the time, you'd not want to disappoint us. Preferably already formatted like "13:23" or something, but also you could technically write anything in here (max 5 chars) if you want to be quirky (Would be funny to se AMOGUS)
